WebApps.name: Wedding Artista
WebApps.description: This project uses authentication with firebase, Here has dashboard functionality for customer and admin. The client has the ability to request an order, check the status of the requested order from the client dashboard. Admin can add product , delete order  or edit product details and add a new admin.

MobileApps.name: Temperature Status Application
MobileApps.description: This is a weather app, this app provides current weather. In This app, we use device location access. And show the current place's temperature. We used API calls to get data from Open weather API. We have built this app with React-Native. It works in IOS and Andriod platform.
